CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: "Picked At Random among the bridge enthusiasts who flocked to the Fort Pitt Hotel in Pittsburgh were these fascinating women. Seated: Alberta Crosby, Chatham, Ontario, Canada; Florence Patterson, Chicago; Nora Tucker, Washington; Effie Goode of Mobile, Ala., and Inez McClelland, Columbus, Ohio.  Standing: Ruth D. Chapital, New Orleans; Ariel W. Holloway, Mobile, Ala.; Blanche Coney, Kansas City Mo.; Fannie Smith, Atlanta, Ga.; Christina Jones, Washington, and Beulah Jones of Chicago."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eleven women, from left, seated: Alberta Crosby, Florence Patterson, Nora Tucker, Effie Goode, and Inez McClelland; standing: Ruth D. Chapital, Ariel W. Holloway, Blanche Coney, Fannie Smith, Christina Jones, and Beulah Jones, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
